home.body1: It's a diary to document your stomach or IBS related problems. All typically known symptoms and causes of IBS are covered.
home.body2: There are a number of reasons why one would document their IBS related problems. The triggers are exceedingly hard to track and identify.
home.body3: IBS is determined by multiple variables. Identifying the triggers requires examining your nutrition, activities and mental health among others. This app provides some overall support in serving as a diary for the afore-mentioned parameters and conditions.
jwt.expired: You have been logged out due to inactivity
